alert.note: Alert for Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 1:28PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN EDDY AND NORTHERN CULBERSON COUNTIES THROUGH 215 PM MDT... At 127 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Carlsbad Caverns National Park, or 18 miles north of Pine Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Carlsbad Caverns National Park, Lincoln National Forest, and Queen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County
